title: What are the implications of modern technologies? - Quora

response.answer_text: More tech coming at us ever faster in the future. Here are some things likely to come along in the future. The scariest technologies will likely be 1) Taking control of our own evolution and not relying on natural selection and more and 2) Creating machines that are much, much smarter than us. The sound good, but it seems every technology has some unintended consequences, and that worries some people. https://alansimpson.me/pages/future/ig/things_to_come/
